name: Contort. Ascend.
description:
A dreamer attempts the impossible, yet again.

Instructions:

  • Place a die in all slots of a limb.
  • High dice rotate the joint counter-clockwise, low clockwise.
  • Avoid swords.
  • Return dice to tray to reroll them.
  • Ascend.

-------------------------

This was made for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam. The prompt was 'Roll of the Dice'.

SFX/Music used from:

  • https://thedarkpiano.com/dark-ambient-music
  • https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Category:Audio_files_of_Gregorian_chant
  • Universal Sound FX Library
